channel.title: [REQ] Boss teleport interface
channel.description:
This is more of 3 images, the background, a close button and a close button hover. Width: 511px Height: 332px I'd like some of bosses (nomad, nex, corp, kalphite queen) on the interface, but not as buttons. I just want them to be a part of the background, and nothing more. Also, I'd like the top center area (like enough for about 5 words, about 5 characters a word, in the bold rs text) to be boxed off. If you (whomever makes this if anyone does) can supply the .psd or .xcf or whatever (you know the file with the separate layers) that'd be really awesome. I'd like the background colors to match my game frame which is a 525-styled one.
If you have any questions, please tell me. And thank you so much for making this.

item.title: [REQ] Boss teleport interface
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I_Hybrid_I:

I could do this for you if you answer my question

Well no, I don’t have an example. I just wanted a cool boss interface that would take up the “clickable” part of the game screen (Where you see other players, etc etc).

Read full topic
